source.8fd39c72:
model2=Sequential()

model2.add(Conv2D(32,(3,3),activation='relu',kernel_initializer='he_uniform',input_shape=(150,150,3)))
#model.add(MaxPool2D())

model2.add(Conv2D(32,(3,3),activation='relu',kernel_initializer='he_uniform'))
model2.add(MaxPool2D())

model2.add(Conv2D(64,(3,3),activation='relu',kernel_initializer='he_uniform'))
model2.add(MaxPool2D())

model2.add(Conv2D(64,(3,3),activation='relu',kernel_initializer='he_uniform'))
model2.add(MaxPool2D())


model2.add(Conv2D(128,(3,3),activation='relu',kernel_initializer='he_uniform'))
model2.add(MaxPool2D())

model2.add(Flatten())

model2.add(Dense(128,activation='relu',kernel_initializer='he_uniform'))
model2.add(Dense(10,activation='sigmoid'))
model2.summary()
